content: auto cup holder insert by pam stiff materials lily sugar n cream solids & denim us h 5 0mm hook abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch front post double_crochet fpdc between btw tutorial for double magic_ring https //www youtube com/watch v=v0tjwp6bseo notes chain 2 does not count as a stitch join all rounds with a slip_stitch you are basically doing a fpdc around every double_crochet with a double_crochet after each fpdc you do pattern round 1 using double magic_ring make 10 double_crochet in ring and join 10st round 2 chain 2 *fpdc around post of double_crochet double_crochet between double_crochet just used and next* around join 20sts round 3 chain 2 *fpdc around previous fpdc double_crochet btw fpdc & next double_crochet fpdc around double_crochet* repeat around to end join and fasten_off 30sts finishing work in all ends i recommend this method for cotton https //verypink com/2011/12/28/weaving-in-cotton-ends/
